column5: This schema represents a person's step count.

column11: see valueQuantity elements below, if body.descriptive_statistic_denominator is present is modifies the units as described below
column12: |2.1|body.step_count|Observation.valueQuantity|see valueQuantity elements below, if body.descriptive_statistic_denominator is present is modifies the units as described below|

column11: IF body.descriptive_statistic_denominatoris present = concatenation of 'steps'  +   mapping of body.descriptive_statistic_denominator to column 'Unit' using  the [OMH_FHIR_Descriptive_Statistic_Denominator_Mapping _Table](#)  (for example 'steps/day')  ELSE  = 'steps'
column12: |2.3|body.step_count.unit|Observation.valueQuantity.unit|IF body.descriptive_statistic_denominatoris present = concatenation of 'steps'  +   mapping of body.descriptive_statistic_denominator to column 'Unit' using  the [OMH_FHIR_Descriptive_Statistic_Denominator_Mapping _Table](#)  (for example 'steps/day')  ELSE  = 'steps'|

column11: IF is present = concatenation of '{steps}'  + mapping of body.descriptive_statistic_denominator to column 'Code' using  the [OMH_FHIR_Descriptive_Statistic_Denominator_Mapping _Table](#)  (for example '{steps}/d')  ELSE  = '{steps}'
column12: |2.5|body.step_count.unit|Observation.valueQuantity.code|IF is present = concatenation of '{steps}'  + mapping of body.descriptive_statistic_denominator to column 'Code' using  the [OMH_FHIR_Descriptive_Statistic_Denominator_Mapping _Table](#)  (for example '{steps}/d')  ELSE  = '{steps}'|

column5: As a measure of a duration, step count should not be associated to a date time time frame. Hence, effective time frame is restricted to be a time interval.

This schema describes an interval of time. In the absence of a precise start and/or end time, the time interval can be described as a date + a part of the day (morning, afternoon, evening, night). No commitments are made as to whether the start or end time point itself is included in the interval (i.e., whether the defined interval includes the boundary point(s) or not).

The descriptive statistic of a set of measurements. A measurement value can be the result of combining various measurements and calculating descriptive statistics like average, maximum, minimum, etc. Additional descriptive statistics will be added as the need arises. A measurement value without a descriptive statistic is interpreted as being the result of an individual measurement.
column11: Map  descriptive statistic to the OMH to FHIR additional Observation codings ( code system http://www.fhir.org/guides/mfhir/omh_fhir_observation_codes).
column12: |5|body.descriptive_statistic|Observation.code.coding[1]|Map  descriptive statistic to the OMH to FHIR additional Observation codings ( code system http://www.fhir.org/guides/mfhir/omh_fhir_observation_codes).|

column11: IF body.descriptive_statistic_denominator is present  = concatenation of  header.schema_id.name = 'step-count'  + '-' + body.descriptive_statistic/body.descriptive_statistic_denominator  for example= step-count-maximum/session, ELSE = concatenation of  header.schema_id.name = 'step-count'  + '-' + body.descriptive_statistic for example= step-count-maximum
column12: |5.1|body.descriptive_statistic|Observation.code.coding[1].code|IF body.descriptive_statistic_denominator is present  = concatenation of  header.schema_id.name = 'step-count'  + '-' + body.descriptive_statistic/body.descriptive_statistic_denominator  for example= step-count-maximum/session, ELSE = concatenation of  header.schema_id.name = 'step-count'  + '-' + body.descriptive_statistic for example= step-count-maximum|

column11: IF body.descriptive_statistic_denominator is present  = concatenation of  header.schema_id.name = 'step-count'  + '-' + body.descriptive_statistic/body.descriptive_statistic_denominator  for example= step-count-maximum/session, ELSE = concatenation of  header.schema_id.name = 'step-count'  + '-' + body.descriptive_statistic for example= step-count-maximum
column12: |5.3|body.descriptive_statistic|Observation.code.coding[1].display|IF body.descriptive_statistic_denominator is present  = concatenation of  header.schema_id.name = 'step-count'  + '-' + body.descriptive_statistic/body.descriptive_statistic_denominator  for example= step-count-maximum/session, ELSE = concatenation of  header.schema_id.name = 'step-count'  + '-' + body.descriptive_statistic for example= step-count-maximum|

column5: The descriptive statistic of a set of measurements. A measurement value can be the result of combining various measurements and calculating descriptive statistics like average, maximum, minimum, etc. Additional descriptive statistics will be added as the need arises. A measurement value without a descriptive statistic is interpreted as being the result of an individual measurement.
